PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_FlowMeterTypeGasMeter
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Device that measures, indicates and sometimes records, the volume of gas that passes through it without interrupting the flow.

PropertyDef.Name: GasType
PropertyDef.Definition: Defines the types of gas that may be specified.

PropertyDef.Name: ConnectionSize
PropertyDef.Definition: Defines the size of inlet and outlet pipe connections to the meter.

PropertyDef.Name: MaximumFlowRate
PropertyDef.Definition: Maximum rate of flow which the meter is expected to pass.

PropertyDef.Name: MaximumPressureLoss
PropertyDef.Definition: Pressure loss expected across the meter under conditions of maximum flow.
